document_data.name: Ki Bohr
document_data.mainbody: '''Ki Bohr''' was the head priest of [[Akari]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Ki Bohr took care of the shrine to the [[Path of Enlightenment]] in the town of [[Tai Ko]]. When the [[ochimo]] started to spread terror, he tried to stop him through offerings, and also went to [[Wa]] to investigate but with no results. Bohr was blamed by Governor [[Ko Lei Kho]] for his failure.
document_data.Personality: Bohr wanted to help stop the evil but was too scared to leave Tai Ko.
